Now let's edit the created product page with a retro 80's style design:

---

```diff
  ---
- // Astro frontmatter here
- ---
- 
- <!-- Astro template here -->
+ import { products } from "@wix/stores";
+ import BaseLayout from "../../layouts/BaseLayout.astro";
+ 
+ const { slug } = Astro.params;
+ 
+ const { items } = await products
+     .queryProducts()
+     .eq("slug", slug)
+     .limit(1)
+     .find();
+ 
+ const product = items[0];
+ 
+ if (!product) return new Response(null, { status: 404 });
+ ---
+ 
+ <BaseLayout>
+   <style slot="head">
+     @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=VT323&family=Audiowide&display=swap');
+     
+     :root {
+       --neon-pink: #ff00ff;
+       --neon-blue: #00ffff;
+       --neon-purple: #9900ff;
+       --neon-green: #00ff00;
+       --neon-yellow: #ffff00;
+       --grid-bg: #000033;
+     }
+ 
+     title {
+       font-family: 'Audiowide', cursive;
+     }
+   </style>
+ 
+   <div class="retro-container" slot="body">
+     <div class="grid-bg"></div>
+     <header class="retro-header">
+       <h1 class="retro-title">{ product.name }</h1>
+       <div class="neon-line"></div>
+     </header>
+ 
+     <main class="retro-content">
+       <div class="product-media">
+         {product.media?.mainMedia && (
+           <div class="main-image-container">
+             <img
+               src={product.media.mainMedia.image?.url}
+               alt={product.media.mainMedia.image?.altText || product.name}
+               class="main-image"
+             />
+           </div>
+         )}
+         
+         {product.media?.items && product.media.items.length > 1 && (
+           <div class="thumbnail-grid">
+             {product.media.items.map((item) => (
+               <div class="thumbnail">
+                 <img 
+                   src={item.image?.url} 
+                   alt={item.image?.altText || product.name} 
+                 />
+               </div>
+             ))}
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+ 
+       <div class="product-info">
+         <div class="neon-box price-box">
+           <div class="price-tag">PRICE</div>
+           <div class="price">
+             {product.priceData?.formatted?.price || "$0.00"}
+           </div>
+           {product.priceData?.formatted?.discountedPrice && (
+             <div class="discounted-price">
+               {product.priceData.formatted.discountedPrice}
+             </div>
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         <div class="neon-box description-box">
+           <h2 class="retro-subtitle">DESCRIPTION</h2>
+           <div class="description-text">{product.description}</div>
+         </div>
+ 
+         <div class="action-box">
+           <button class="add-to-cart-btn">ADD TO CART</button>
+           {product.stock?.inventoryStatus === "IN_STOCK" ? (
+             <div class="in-stock">IN STOCK</div>
+           ) : (
+             <div class="out-of-stock">OUT OF STOCK</div>
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {product.productOptions && product.productOptions.length > 0 && (
+           <div class="neon-box options-box">
+             <h2 class="retro-subtitle">OPTIONS</h2>
+             <div class="options-grid">
+               {product.productOptions.map((option) => (
+                 <div class="option">
+                   <div class="option-name">{option.name}</div>
+                   <div class="choices-grid">
+                     {option.choices.map((choice) => (
+                       <div class="choice-item">{choice.value}</div>
+                     ))}
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+               ))}
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </main>
+   </div>
+ 
+   <style>
+     .retro-container {
+       position: relative;
+       min-height: 100vh;
+       font-family: 'VT323', monospace;
+       background-color: black;
+       color: white;
+       padding: 2rem;
+       overflow-x: hidden;
+     }
+ 
+     .grid-bg {
+       position: fixed;
+       top: 0;
+       left: 0;
+       right: 0;
+       bottom: 0;
+       background-color: var(--grid-bg);
+       background-image: 
+         linear-gradient(rgba(127, 17, 224, 0.3) 1px, transparent 1px),
+         linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(127, 17, 224, 0.3) 1px, transparent 1px);
+       background-size: 40px 40px;
+       z-index: -1;
+       transform: perspective(500px) rotateX(60deg);
+       transform-origin: center top;
+       animation: grid-move 20s infinite linear;
+     }
+ 
+     @keyframes grid-move {
+       from {
+         background-position: 0 0;
+       }
+       to {
+         background-position: 0 40px;
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     .retro-header {
+       margin-bottom: 3rem;
+       text-align: center;
+     }
+ 
+     .retro-title {
+       font-family: 'Audiowide', cursive;
+       font-size: 4rem;
+       color: var(--neon-pink);
+       text-shadow: 
+         0 0 5px var(--neon-pink),
+         0 0 10px var(--neon-pink),
+         0 0 20px var(--neon-pink);
+       margin: 0;
+       padding: 1rem;
+       letter-spacing: 2px;
+       animation: flicker 2s infinite alternate;
+     }
+ 
+     @keyframes flicker {
+       0%, 19.999%, 22%, 62.999%, 64%, 100% {
+         opacity: 1;
+       }
+       20%, 21.999%, 63%, 63.999% {
+         opacity: 0.8;
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     .neon-line {
+       height: 4px;
+       background: linear-gradient(90deg, 
+         transparent 0%, 
+         var(--neon-blue) 20%, 
+         var(--neon-pink) 50%,
+         var(--neon-blue) 80%, 
+         transparent 100%);
+       box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-blue);
+       margin: 1rem auto;
+     }
+ 
+     .retro-content {
+       display: flex;
+       flex-direction: column;
+       gap: 2rem;
+     }
+ 
+     @media (min-width: 768px) {
+       .retro-content {
+         flex-direction: row;
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     .product-media {
+       flex: 1;
+     }
+ 
+     .main-image-container {
+       position: relative;
+       border: 4px solid var(--neon-blue);
+       border-radius: 10px;
+       overflow: hidden;
+       box-shadow: 
+         0 0 10px var(--neon-blue),
+         0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5);
+     }
+ 
+     .main-image {
+       width: 100%;
+       display: block;
+       max-height: 500px;
+       object-fit: contain;
+     }
+ 
+     .thumbnail-grid {
+       display: grid;
+       grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(80px, 1fr));
+       gap: 1rem;
+       margin-top: 1rem;
+     }
+ 
+     .thumbnail {
+       border: 2px solid var(--neon-purple);
+       border-radius: 8px;
+       overflow: hidden;
+       cursor: pointer;
+       transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
+     }
+ 
+     .thumbnail:hover {
+       transform: scale(1.05);
+       box-shadow: 0 0 15px var(--neon-purple);
+     }
+ 
+     .thumbnail img {
+       width: 100%;
+       height: 80px;
+       object-fit: cover;
+       display: block;
+     }
+ 
+     .product-info {
+       flex: 1;
+       display: flex;
+       flex-direction: column;
+       gap: 2rem;
+     }
+ 
+     .neon-box {
+       border: 3px solid var(--neon-green);
+       border-radius: 10px;
+       padding: 1rem;
+       position: relative;
+       background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
+       box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-green);
+     }
+ 
+     .price-box {
+       border-color: var(--neon-yellow);
+       box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-yellow);
+       padding: 2rem;
+       text-align: center;
+     }
+ 
+     .price-tag {
+       position: absolute;
+       top: -15px;
+       left: 50%;
+       transform: translateX(-50%);
+       background-color: black;
+       padding: 0 1rem;
+       font-family: 'Audiowide', cursive;
+       color: var(--neon-yellow);
+       font-size: 1.2rem;
+     }
+ 
+     .price {
+       font-size: 3rem;
+       font-family: 'Audiowide', cursive;
+       color: var(--neon-yellow);
+       text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-yellow);
+     }
+ 
+     .discounted-price {
+       font-size: 2rem;
+       color: var(--neon-green);
+       text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-green);
+       margin-top: 0.5rem;
+     }
+ 
+     .retro-subtitle {
+       font-family: 'Audiowide', cursive;
+       color: var(--neon-green);
+       text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-green);
+       margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
+       font-size: 1.8rem;
+     }
+ 
+     .description-text {
+       font-size: 1.4rem;
+       line-height: 1.6;
+       color: white;
+       text-shadow: 0 0 2px white;
+     }
+ 
+     .action-box {
+       display: flex;
+       flex-direction: column;
+       gap: 1rem;
+       align-items: center;
+     }
+ 
+     .add-to-cart-btn {
+       font-family: 'Audiowide', cursive;
+       background-color: var(--neon-pink);
+       color: white;
+       border: none;
+       border-radius: 8px;
+       padding: 1rem 2rem;
+       font-size: 1.5rem;
+       cursor: pointer;
+       transition: all 0.2s;
+       width: 100%;
+       box-shadow: 
+         0 0 10px var(--neon-pink),
+         0 0 20px rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.5);
+       text-shadow: 0 0 5px white;
+     }
+ 
+     .add-to-cart-btn:hover {
+       background-color: var(--neon-purple);
+       box-shadow: 
+         0 0 15px var(--neon-purple),
+         0 0 30px rgba(153, 0, 255, 0.5);
+       transform: translateY(-3px);
+     }
+ 
+     .add-to-cart-btn:active {
+       transform: translateY(1px);
+     }
+ 
+     .in-stock {
+       color: var(--neon-green);
+       font-size: 1.3rem;
+       text-transform: uppercase;
+       text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-green);
+     }
+ 
+     .out-of-stock {
+       color: var(--neon-pink);
+       font-size: 1.3rem;
+       text-transform: uppercase;
+       text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-pink);
+     }
+ 
+     .options-box {
+       border-color: var(--neon-purple);
+       box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-purple);
+     }
+ 
+     .options-grid {
+       display: flex;
+       flex-direction: column;
+       gap: 1.5rem;
+     }
+ 
+     .option-name {
+       font-size: 1.5rem;
+       color: var(--neon-blue);
+       margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+       text-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--neon-blue);
+     }
+

+       display: flex;
+       flex-wrap: wrap;
+       gap: 0.5rem;
+     }
+

+       cursor: pointer;

+     }
+

+       background-color: var(--neon-blue);
+       color: black;
+       box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-blue);
+     }
+   </style>
+ </BaseLayout>
```

Let's fix the linter error about the undefined choices:

---



---

Now let's add a fun head title for the product page:

---



---

I've created a retro 80's style product page with the following features:

1. A synthwave grid background with perspective effect and animation
2. Neon colors throughout (pink, blue, purple, green, yellow)
3. Retro typography using VT323 (pixelated font) and Audiowide (futuristic font)
4. Glowing text effects with text-shadow
5. Neon boxes with glowing borders
6. A flickering animation on the title
7. Interactive elements with hover effects
8. Responsive layout that works on mobile and desktop
9. Complete product information display including:
   - Product images with thumbnails
   - Price with discount support
   - Description
   - Add to cart button
   - Stock status
   - Product options with selectable choices

The page handles all the product data from the Wix Stores API and displays it in a fun, nostalgic 80's style that includes classic retro computing and synthwave aesthetics.

---
